post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Eagle Soft


Job Description

Our client, a high profile organization, is currently seeking one (1) Java Developer. This is a contract opportunity slated to begin in March, and is projected to be six (6) months in length with the possibility of extending.

Skills and Qualifications

The qualified candidate must have:

Four plus (4+) years of Java experience;
Knowledge of C / C++;
Sybase skills;
Ant experience;
A University degree; and,
CSC an asset.

Don't miss out on this opportunity, apply on-line today!

We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only candidates under consideration will be contacted.  Please note that your application does not signify the beginning of employment with Eagle and that employment with Eagle will only commence when placed on an assignment as a temporary employee of Eagle.
post.title: Java Developer - Capital Markets (Agent)
